title: Pantheon continues to be an issue.
body:
When is he getting a rework? Me being forced to sit under tower because he spams his point and click 200 damage Q ability at me isn't really what I call healthy gameplay. I'd honestly rather go against a Teemo, because at least he can't one shot me if I'm at 75% hp at level 3.

Edit: I've been reading up on the comments, and mostly everyone's solution is to pick armor runes. Problem there is that you can't change runes in champion select.

>
> Grab full armor runes against him, while you still can.

Heavy armor runes and dorans shield shuts him down. Which pays off on any champ really.
I have 2 rune pages for ad and ap , how am i supposed to just "grab" her by the armor rune page then?

This is why having more than 2 rune pages is important. It's necessary to have extra rune pages for niche things like spec'ing into armor runes to not die in lane.

It's a horrible IP sink and why Riot is changing the rune/mastery system (again) so we'll see what options you have in the future. For now, buy extra rune pages or lose.

> [{quoted}](name=Glamorous Rammus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=efEmMKRE,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2017-06-22T03:08:57.952+0000)

> I think it should be a skillshot like Nid's.

One of the reason why he hasn't gotten rework is because the obvious solution to his Q means it would become the exact same ability as Nid's Q. Riot thus tries the approach of making the targeted spear his signature and different to Nid in that respect, but then it becomes a bit of a problem because Panth's Q is supposed to define his primary strength as well, which means Q has to be both targeted and powerful.

And Riot has gotten stuck.

I guess one of the better approach is "making it count". Meaning, it makes it so that spear can not be spammed, usually done by upping the CD with perhaps situational CDR reduction such as from AA.
